1.3.0.en: Application has been completely rewritten, information is now updated in real time and will use less memory.

1.3.3.en: Add support for smart detections and fix some bugs

1.3.5.en: App crashes after motion or doorbell ring

1.4.0.en: Add support for UniFi Flood light

1.4.1.en: Some changes in the websocket lib and debug modus on (Test version)

1.5.4.en: Bugfix for crash when some camera's are not added to homey

1.5.5.en: Fixed socket.on error message with pairing

1.5.7.en: Removed reconnected after connection loss because of memory leak.

1.5.8.en: Smartdetection fixed, Score and type are broken for now!

1.5.9.en: Add Sensor driver and Light driver

1.5.10.en: New icon files for sensors and light

1.5.12.en: Bugfix: fetch is not an function

1.5.15.en: Bugfix: ReferenceError: s is not defined

1.5.17.en: Add doorbell support and doorbel pressed flow.

1.5.18.en: Fixing connection status and old action flow cards

1.5.20.en: Removed height and width and added image name to snapshot

1.5.21.en: Add option to get snapshot directly from the camera

1.5.22.en: Add option to get snapshot directly from the camera

1.5.23.en: Upgrade node packages to latest version

1.5.24.en: Upgrade node packages to latest version

1.5.25.en: Add support for setting Night Vision in UI and Flow

1.5.27.en: Add support to set LCD message for Doorbell

1.6.0.en: Support for new firmware UnifiOS devices

1.6.3.en: Added Last Websocket Message At in settings page

1.6.4.en: Fix Volume Door Chime (Thanks Jeroen Aartse)

1.6.5.en: Fixed: Cookie is now refreshed every hour, missing options added for light_mode and nightvision and latest packages

1.6.6.en: Fix: useCameraSnapshot can now be disabled and extra notice when saving.

1.6.7.en: Fix: Unifi Light Motion options and Brightness

1.6.8.en: Add support for device smart detections

1.6.9.en: Fixing breaking change for smart detections

1.6.12.en: Add Unknown SmartMotion trigger and more debug information

1.6.13.en: Add more debug information and Unknown Smartmotion trigger
